law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 24, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 187, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 146, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 13, sec. 30, effective June 18, 1970.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Withholding information or giving false or misleading information.
metadata.lrc-note: .This section was amended by 1982 Acts Chapter 320, Section 21 and repealed by 1982 Acts Chapter 278, Section 24. Pursuant to KRS 446.260, the repeal prevails.
